title: Client Freezing during and after champ select
body: So for the past few lobbies that I have gotten into the champ select timer will either go to 0 so i can't see anything until i dodge because I can't ban or lock in, or it will go through the whole champ select and then not load me into the game. I'm getting really tired of this because I'm losing Lp and time because of the leaverbuster. Help, please.

replies.body:
For now, make sure you're troubleshooting this weird connection thing in custom or practice games so you don't keep losing LP!

First try using an ethernet connection if you can, it sounds like your network is just having problems sending the info of who you're picking and banning to the servers handling that data. Using a hardwired connection should make that a bit smoother. If that's not helping right off the bat, check out the other steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some other quick steps to try.

ive had this problem for 2 days now yesterday i was able to play fine until the issue occured and i havent been able to connect to a match since then ive reset my clent, computer and router. other games work just fine and so do my consoles this problem is only occuring with LoL. ive seen a few posts like this including my own and the Player support answers are always basically the same they blame your internet connection and say if the issue persists to submit a ticket. they need to realize theres an issue and stop punishing people for trying to play the game
